title: Raised Arms / Hands
description: Primary body parts engaged Chest, Shoulders, Spine Stretches torso and spine Expands lungs and stretches abdominal organs Brings feeling of expansion How to perform Raised Arms / Hands Stand with your feet hip distance wide. Point your big toes forward. Allow your arms to hang by your sides. Reach the crown of your head toward the sky.Point your tailbone toward the floor. Reach your arms forward and up with an inhale, palms facing forward. Gently arch back and gaze diagonally upward. Keep length in your spine. Hold the pose for a moment.
alignment_cues: Maintain steady breath throughout the pose
Keep proper alignment based on pose type
Listen to your body and modify as needed
